summary: SummaryMario Badescu's Aloe Vera Toner is an alcohol-free and fragrance-free formula that comforts skin in need of a hydrating, post-cleanse boost. This toner gently tones and rebalances skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsGluten-freeSulfate-freePhthalate-freeSynthetic fragrance-freeItem 2210018How To UseTwice daily after cleansing, apply to skin with a cotton ball or pad. Wipe in sweeping, outward motions until the cotton comes up clean. Avoid eye area. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.IngredientsAqua (Water, Eau), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Hexylene Glycol, Methylparaben, Propylene Glycol, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Chloride, CI 19140 (Yellow 5), CI 42090 (Blue 1).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Twice daily after cleansing, apply to skin with a cotton ball or pad. Wipe in sweeping, outward motions until the cotton comes up clean. Avoid eye area. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.

reviews.headline: My Go-To Toner
reviews.comments: the best toner on the market. Cleans gently without drying

reviews.headline: Great for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I have very sensitive skin due to rosacea, so I try to avoid anything that will obliterate my face. This is soft and gentle to use. Subtle fragrance but feels nice and clean before any serums. Also, can't beat the price especially while it's on sale!

reviews.headline: works so good!
reviews.comments: i love this product! it leaves my skin feeling so clean and soft! highly recommend!!!

reviews.headline: Simple
reviews.comments: Basic, effective, gentle, soothing & moisturizing toner. Preps my skin for the rest of my skincare steps.

reviews.headline: Love this toner!
reviews.comments: I use this toner daily.  It helps return my skin to the proper PH levels as well as hydrating my skin.

reviews.headline: Gave me red spots
reviews.comments: I wanted to like this toner, it smells good and feels clean going on, overall does its job. But I was getting tiny red spots that resemble mild rosacea across both cheeks from it. Within about a week or two of finishing this bottle and switching to a different brand toner, the spotting cleared right ip.

reviews.headline: Love this toner!
reviews.comments: This is a moisturizing, calming toner that I use daily!  No drying ingredients to strip my skin, it feels so smooth and hydrated after I use it.

reviews.headline: I keep coming back for more!
reviews.comments: I use it right after washing my face. Honestly this is the only Mario badescue product I use and I love it. I feel like this toner helps reduce scars left behind by nasty pimples. I had a dark spot from scarring that I thought would never go away and after I started using this toner I noticed it getting lighter and lighter til I couldn't notice it anymore. Now it's the only toner I'll use.

reviews.headline: I will keep buying
reviews.comments: I use this every morning. Makes my skin soft. Love it.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Love Mario products. I switched to pure witch hazel and it almost ruined my skin. This is forever my go to toner.

reviews.headline: Favorite Toner
reviews.comments: I haven't tried many others as I found this one years ago. Oily skin but sensitive to breakouts and dry patches. This keeps my skin refreshed and clean feeling always. Love this product!!

reviews.headline: Gentle and effective
reviews.comments: I Use this every evening before bed before night cream

reviews.headline: Beyond worth it
reviews.comments: Hands down the best toner I've ever used. I have dry, sensitive skin. For that price, I haven't found anything that works better for me.

reviews.headline: Soothing and refreshing
reviews.comments: This product is perfect for me. I have sensitive skin and need added hydration.

reviews.headline: Love love will buy again
reviews.comments: So refreshing after washing my face and leaves moisture.

reviews.headline: Refreshing and doesn't dry my skin out
reviews.comments: I've tried many toners over the years and was skeptical of this because it was so much cheaper than the others. However, my dry, acne prone skin loves it! It's super soothing and tones my skin well. Highly recommended.

reviews.headline: DO NOT USE
reviews.comments: This is literally fragrance with alcohol diluted with water. Zero benefit and can actually be irritating. A ridiculous product hyped up with marketing. No no nooo

reviews.headline: Where has this been all my life
reviews.comments: Get rid of whatever other toner you own, because this is all you ever needed.  I have typically normal skin, but when the weather decides that my skin should be dry...my skin is DRRRYYYYYYY!!!  Like watch my skin flake from my hot burning face dry.  Sooo I decided, you know let's try this 7 skins technique as if my skin care routine wasn't already ridiculous.  After much research I thought I'd try this product for 7 skins. Most skincare products need a build up to see results...not this stuff.  First time I used it....amazing!!!! Like the heavens opened from above and gave me gods gift to the softest and most hydrated skin ever.  So if you don't hate yourself use this product.

reviews.headline: Good For Winter Dry Skin
reviews.comments: I do not normally have dry skin, however I moved to a much colder climate and this winter weather has zapped the moisture in my face. After only a week of using the aloe vera toner, I noticed a huge improvement in my skin's texture and moisture. This is my first Mario Badescu purchase. Eager to try more!

reviews.headline: Amazing for dry skin
reviews.comments: This is an incredible toner for dry skin. I know toners aren't necessary but I like using one. I have always liked it but when I ran out I was like "oh no I can tell what's missing!" This is doing wonderful things for my akin. Feels refreshing and not stripping.

Excellent for sensitive skin and dry skin
Keeps skin moisturized as it tones your skin.

faceoff_positive.comments: I love aloe vera. Aloe is so good for your skin and I am always looking for MORE ways to get MORE aloe vera on my skin. I typically use lemon Witch Hazel every morning to wake up my skin and I love that delcious lemon scent - it wakes me right up. But my bottle of witch hazel was low and I wanted to try this Aloe Toner. I have used every day for a week and it's wondeful! Not at all drying like many toner seem to be. This one doesn't have much scent if any, which is fine with me, and it makes my skin feel great first thing in the morning. I will continue to use it!
faceoff_positive.headline: I'm in love with this!

faceoff_negative.comments: Bought this on a trip where the water was super hard so needed something to wipe the minerals off my face after washing. This was suggested by an employee who I informed of my skin troubles. This product slowly but surely ruined my skin. Thinking it's the methylparaben and coloring. Used for two months not realizing my acne was from this and not stress/hormones. HUGE MISTAKE. I broke out in places I've never had acne before. I have to deal with terrible scarring now. If you're a no wearing makeup kind of person like me, you know how terribly this has affected me, I've spent many days and nights in avoiding going out in public and honestly have cried over how messed up this made my skin.  Sensitive skin individuals - STAY AWAY!  Don't let the "aloe" fool you.
faceoff_negative.headline: COLOR & MYTHYLPARABEN
